tooltip.cloudedisles.starborne_cleaver.t: §8§oRight-Click on an enemy to smash them with a meteor
tooltip.cloudedisles.guardian_shield.too: §8§oRight-Click while shifting to damage nearby enemies
tooltip.cloudedisles.cloud_bottle.toolti: §8§oRight-Click to dash in the direction you are facing
tooltip.cloudedisles.astral_prism.toolti: §8§oPoints towards the nearest sky isle. (R-Click to activate)
